name: Mister Bumblebee Racing Champion
overview: Join Mr. Bumblebee in his first big adventure! Pass huge flowers and the crowd cheering in the grandstand - watch out for the waterfall! Quick, to the left, or your wings will get wet! Oh, there's Junky Punkie again, the little pest! Good thing you just collected some turbo power – now you can fly much faster than all the other insects! Features: * Suitable for any age thanks to adjustable game speed! * Beautifully hand-drawn graphics! * Play alone or with up to four players! * Choose from four different game modes on six tracks
